game_description: SplashFly is a fun arcady paper plane flight combat game SplashFly is still in developpement! If you like it, you can join the community, support it by going on SplashFly website! Future for SplashFly hold: - Multiplatform support (pc, VR headset, consoles, etc) - Multiplayer split screen - Online Multiplayer - More weapons, bonuses, maps, skins, modes and customizability - And whatever I or the community would think about ^^
review_1: This game has a cool approach but was not executed well. Moving the glider around gave me a headache and was not fun. I think if the dev wants it to be better they should really re work the glider movement.
